titles.title: Recognizing the International Day of Rural Women on October 15, 2017, in celebration of women farmers around the world.
Recognizing the International Day of Rural Women on October 15, 2017, in celebration of women farmers around the world.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
Recognizes the International Day of Rural Women.
Calls on the people of the United States and interested groups to:
celebrate rural women as integral members of societies and economies around the world; recognize women farmers for their role in feeding their families and fellow countrymen and for their productivity which helps maintain economic stability and stronger democracies; ensure rural women have access to the tools and productive resources they need to engage in entrepreneurship; and recommit to reducing limitations, breaking down barriers to success, and prioritizing initiatives that wholly support rural women farmers at the local level.
